description: This file defines a configured Axios HTTP client for API requests, including interceptors for attaching authentication tokens from Supabase and handling responses.

methods.name: axios.create
methods.description: Creates a new Axios instance with specified configuration.

methods.name: apiClient.interceptors.request.use
methods.description: Attaches a request interceptor to add Authorization headers based on Supabase session.

methods.name: apiClient.interceptors.response.use
methods.description: Attaches a response interceptor to handle responses and errors.
